summary: The Block's Research Analyst Andrew Cahill takes a look at the state of decentralized identity solutions.
title: The state of decentralized identity solutions — Brought to you by Ontology
content: In this event The Block’s Research Analyst Andrew Cahill takes a look at the state of decentralized identity solutions.
As a precursor to this video, read The Block Research’s recent report “An introduction to decentralized identity solutions”.
You can learn more about our panelists and watch the video in its entirety below:
Daniel Buchner – Senior PM, Decentralized Identity at Microsoft
